name: arma-server-manager
description: Arma 3 server manager with mod management, server configuration, and scheduling capabilities

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env FLASK_ENV=production uv run python main.py
scripts.dev:celery: cd backend && cross-env PYTHONPATH=. uv run celery -A app.celery worker --loglevel=info --pool=solo
scripts.dev:celery-beat: cd backend && cross-env PYTHONPATH=. uv run celery -A app.celery beat --loglevel=info
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --names "backend,celery,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:celery" "pnpm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:full-with-beat: concurrently --names "backend,celery,celery-beat,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green,cyan,yellow" "pnpm run dev:backend" "pnpm run dev:celery" "pnpm run dev:celery-beat" "pnpm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && uv sync && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.start:prod: FLASK_ENV=production cd backend && uv run python main.py
scripts.test: pnpm run test:backend && pnpm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff check . && uv run mypy .
scripts.format: pnpm run format:backend && pnpm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend && uv run ruff format . && uv run black .
